forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning fog, then mostly cloudy this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with some morning fog. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 62F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High around 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 59F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High around 60F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later in the day. High 16C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
